entry.title: 🎉 Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ⭐️

entry.title: 汉界
entry.content:
Discount Information（Price：$0.99 → Free (Free ~ $0.99)）

Application Description

汉界APP致力于依托强大的底层区块链技术，为广大用户提供数字化的数字艺术品流转、保护、认证平台。在这里，用户可以充分感受到数字藏品的魅力，体验到数字藏品所带来的新奇和价值，汉界也将基于自身强大的技术实力，为广大用户提供数字资产保护、流转记录上链、数据实时展示等全方位的完备服务，加倍赋予超强情绪价值。

entry.title: Kingdom Rush 5: Alliance TD
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • All Heroes：$29.99 → $19.99 ($19.99 ~ $29.99)

Application Description

With greater power and menace than ever before, Kingdom Rush 5: Alliance brings forth a fresh, exhilarating experience, building upon the lightning-paced and captivating gameplay that propelled its predecessors to award-winning status. While a formidable evil emerges, an unexpected alliance is taking shape! It will take the finest warriors of Linirea and the relentless Dark Army to stop it. Beware! Though they may journey side by side the ever-changing winds of fate could swiftly alter their course. Prepare to harness the formidable might of dual heroes on the battlefield! YES, now you can play not only with one dragon but with TWO! Double the fire-breathing fun, double the chaos—just make sure they don't argue over who gets to hoard the most gold! All the heavy hitters like Paladins, Archers, Mages, Necromancers, and a bunch more are yours to boss around. But watch out, they might start arguing about who's the real hero of the party while the enemies sneak by! Are you poised for the ultimate clash? Embark on an epic journey alongside the brave warriors of Linirea and the relentless Dark Army as they unite to conquer a colossal foe. GAME FEATURES: Recruit 34 unique heroes and towers! - 18 ELITE TOWERS to build and upgrade What’s a strategy game without mighty defense towers? Seize them to clash against any enemy! Pick between accurate Archers, lethal Paladins, and even trickful Demon Pits. - 16 EPIC HEROES - take tower defense battles to the next level PLAY WITH 2 HEROES SIMULTANEOUSLY! Get ready to witness the formidable might of the most unlikely dual-heroes combinations. A forest guardian spirit and a powerful battle automaton or perhaps a space-bending mage and your average Joe. - 6 TERRAINS with fascinating battlefields to conquer Defend Kingdom Rush’s colorful landscapes. Clash across the realm’s deep forest, or even its dangerous caverns. - 25 CAMPAIGN STAGES full of fast-paced td battles Set your strategy in exotic terrains full of surprising challenges and details. Clash against hordes of unpredictable enemies and epic boss fights to take your defense strategy to the limit! - 3 DIFFERENT GAME MODES to test your might Try different and more challenging ways of playing each stage after you emerge victorious. Who doesn't love a good challenge? - 58+ GAME ACHIEVEMENTS to conquer in battle What’s an epic strategy game without tasty rewards? Show off your skills and unlock prizes! - 45+ DIFFERENT ENEMIES to test your tower defense wits Show the alliance’s td battle skills with 4 different enemy clans. Beat each of them with a unique defense strategy! - And, of course… There are lots of easter eggs and the usual Ironhide Game Studio lighthearted humor. Because what's a strategy game without a few hidden surprises? -------- Ironhide Terms and Conditions: https://www.ironhidegames.com/TermsOfService Ironhide Privacy Policy: https://www.ironhidegames.com/PrivacyPolicy
